item.title: Text Preprocessing using textclean
item.description: Take tweet from twitter using rtweet package Function used for take tweet from twitter is search_tweets(). There are several parameter usually used in that function: - Topic : topic you will find at twitter - n : how many tweet that you want to take - include_rts : logical. If FALSE tweet taken didn’t contain retweet - lang : spesified language. If you want take tweet in english you can add argument lang = “en” You can use this code below to try taking tweets from twitter by removing the command
